tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    account_created TIMESTAMP,
    virtual_reality_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE UserProfiles (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    profile_image_url VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE SocialConnections (
    connection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id1 INT NOT NULL,
    user_id2 INT NOT NULL,
    connection_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    connection_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE UserProfiles (
    userID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    age INT,
    profile_image BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE SocialConnections (
    connectionID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    userID1 INT,
    userID2 INT,
    status VARCHAR(20) CHECK (status IN ('connected', 'pending', 'blocked')),
    connection_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE VirtualRealityHub (
    hubID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hub_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    user_capacity INT,
    online_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE UserProfiles (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    birthdate DATE,
    profile_picture_url VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Friends (
    friend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    friend_user_id INT,
    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'pending',
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES UserProfiles(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (friend_user_id) REFERENCES UserProfiles(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Connections (
    connection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    connected_to_user_id INT,
    connection_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    connection_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES UserProfiles(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (connected_to_user_id) REFERENCES UserProfiles(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Messages (
    message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_user_id INT,
    receiver_user_id INT,
    message_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    sent_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (sender_user_id) REFERENCES UserProfiles(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (receiver_user_id) REFERENCES UserProfiles(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE UserProfiles (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    age INT
);

CREATE TABLE UserConnections (
    connection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    connected_user_id INT,
    connection_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES UserProfiles(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (connected_user_id) REFERENCES UserProfiles(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE UserPosts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    post_content TEXT,
    post_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES UserProfiles(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE UserComments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    comment_content TEXT,
    comment_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES UserPosts(post_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES UserProfiles(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE UserLikes (
    like_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    like_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES UserPosts(post_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES UserProfiles(user_id)
);
